group_1.textLeft: So, this time...
We will be discussing Juri's problem...

group_1.textRight: What? You can tell just by lookin'.
I dunno what's going on...
It's like she's always chanting weird spells@or somethin'. It's scaring me, y'know?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, she's just...
memorizing English and old conjugations, isn't she?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's it.@Last-minute cramming before an exam, right?

group_1.textLeft: I was thinking the same thing～
Uh-huh... If I fail my next test, I'll either get expelled@or held back a year.
And if I get expelled, I might have to move...

group_1.textRight: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textLeft: Crap, that's even worse than I thought!

group_1.textRight: That sure is hard to take in...

group_1.textLeft: I already almost got expelled once for actin' out.

group_1.textRight: This would be strike three, huh...
I didn't expect them to take it this far～
That's seriously Hard Mode...

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]That's why I've been bustin' my ASS studyin'!

group_1.textRight: Wah, don't get violent!

group_1.textLeft: The school life that I hung onto with my wish...
I can't give it up that easy...
And movin' away means@Juri the Great would be out of the war.

group_1.textRight: If Juri's gone, who's gonna look after the girls@in Ryuugasaki...?
Well... That's not the big issue here, is it...

group_1.textLeft: No, not particularly...@...When is your exam?

group_1.textRight: Tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: How much progress have you made?

group_1.textRight: Jack shit.

group_1.textLeft: What subjects will be covered?

group_1.textRight: Japanese, math, English, and science.
What?! That's Lunatic difficulty!
Juri won't wanna ask herself, so I'll ask for her.@Please...
Yuna, Sakuya, please teach Juri how to study...

group_1.textLeft: Of course. You don't have to tell meー@I'm happy to do so...
I'll help out as best I can,@since Juri and our group are both in danger.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm countin' on you.

group_1.textLeft: Juri's so honest...

group_1.textRight: That's how terrible the situation she's in is, see...
We'll have to support her the best we can!

group_1.textLeft: Roger!

group_1.textRight: I'll help, too!

group_1.textLeft: Let's work together for the sake of everyone@in Futatsugi City...!
